Sentencas: Epitaxial growth of Ce(0.8)Gd(0.2)O(2)(CGO) films on (001) TiO(2)-terminated SrTiO(3) substrates by pulsed laser deposition was investigated using in situ reflective high energy electron diffraction.
Titulo: Epitaxial growth of atomically flat gadolinia-doped ceria thin films by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The initial film growth shows a Stransky-Krastanov growth mode.
Titulo: Epitaxial growth of atomically flat gadolinia-doped ceria thin films by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: However, this three-dimensional island formation is replaced by a two-dimensional island nucleation during further deposition, which results in atomically smooth CGO films.
Titulo: Epitaxial growth of atomically flat gadolinia-doped ceria thin films by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The obtained high-quality CGO films may be attractive for the electrolyte of solid-oxide fuel cells operating at low temperature.
Titulo: Epitaxial growth of atomically flat gadolinia-doped ceria thin films by pulsed laser deposition
